about_the_game:
Step into a haunting journey through Dreary Lake Asylum, where reality blurs with nightmare. Inspired by the classic PSX survival horror era, Suffocate plunges you into a fever dream of a plot that will test your logic, courage, and sanity.

Story:
Play as Hera, a young girl tormented by the loss of her child and haunted by the echoes of her own mother's abuse. Within the walls of Dreary Lake Asylum, she must navigate a labyrinth of memories and horrors, piecing together the truth of her daughter's disappearance. The game’s narrative is interwoven with evocative poetry, revealing the depth of Hera's grief and the cruel hands that shaped her fate.

Gameplay:
Classic Survival Horror: Experience the tension and fear of survival horror in the style of PSX classics. Limited resources, cryptic puzzles, and relentless threats will keep you on edge.
Fever Dream Plot: Navigate a story that twists and turns, challenging your perception of reality and truth.
Atmospheric Exploration: Explore the eerie, decaying halls of Dreary Lake Asylum, rendered in nostalgic low-poly graphics that capture the essence of PSX horror.
Emotional Depth: Engage with a deeply emotional story that tackles themes of loss, grief, and the dark side of familial love.

Features:
  • Authentic PSX Visuals: Immerse yourself in a game that faithfully recreates the visual style and atmosphere of PSX era horror games.
  • Intricate Puzzles: Solve complex puzzles that will test your logic and ingenuity as you uncover the asylum’s dark secrets.
  • Retro combat: Utilize scarce ammo in your pistol, or melee attack the ghosts of your past with knives, pipes, and more.
  • Poetic Narratives: Discover poems that delve into Hera’s psyche, offering insight into her pain and the tragic events that unfolded.
  • Will you survive the echoes of the past, or will you be consumed by the shadows of Dreary Lake?

Wishlist Suffocate now and prepare for a journey into the heart of horror and heartbreak.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following elements that may be disturbing to some players:

Violence: The game includes intense and graphic scenes of violence.
Grief: Themes of loss and emotional suffering are prominently featured.
Infanticide: There are scenes involving insinuated harm to infants.
Depiction of a 1980's Psychiatric Ward: The portrayal of a psychiatric ward in the game is purely fictional and dramatized. It does not reflect contemporary mental health care practices or facilities.

Player discretion is advised.

name: Suffocate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: x86 - 32 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
